person: a Dutchman, a Dutchwoman, or a Netherlander

adjective: New Zealand (used attributively only, as in New Zealand butter but not He is New Zealand)

person: a Papua New Guinean or a Guinean
a Saudi Arabian or a Saudi

a Trinidadian
 a Tobagan
 a Tobagonian

adjective: UAE or Emirates (used attributively only, as in UAE buildings, Emirates holidays but not He is UAE, I am Emirates) or Emirati
UK (used attributively only, as in UK time but not He is UK) or British
US (used attributively only, as in US aggression but not He is US)
